title: Mules and Men - speaker's description of research

content.question: In the third paragraph, the speaker's description of her research strategy includes all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: a realization that personal concerns affected her choice
a tone that reflects both confidence and uncertainty
a sense of anxiety about being a pioneer in her profession
an understanding of the importance of gathering diverse information

content.answer: a sense of anxiety about being a pioneer in her profession

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
